answers.answer: I was induced with my daughter.  I think they started about 9-9:30 and she was born at 5:25.  She was my second.
I was induced with my son they endured me at 8am my son was born at 704pm
With my first I was induced at 5am had him at 8 30pm. With my second at 11am had her at 8pm. Plan on doing it with my third here real soon!

With my first I was induced at 13:00, had her 20 hours later at 8:55.With my second I was induced at 17:00 had her 7 hours later at 23:55.im being induced Thursday as well with #3. They are admitting me at 4pm so it will be interesting to see how it goes.Good luck, hoping for a short easy labour for you!
Arg good luck to you too , im going in at 08.30 . Fingers crossed we will have our babys in our arms in no time x
I was induced at 5 am he didnt come until 9:23pm
I was induced, I was in labor for 43 hours before ending up getting emergency c-section.
My induction due to preeclampsia stalled (never prgressed passed 3-4cm dilation) and I ended up with an emergency c-section due to continued increasing BPs.

question: I know it's different for everyone but just be interesting how long it took for people.Im being induced on Thursday at 39wk 2 days due to reduced movements.Be good to hear different experiences thanks
title: how long where u in bring induced ???
